name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Presales Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud solutions, data integration, and analytics. Proven expertise in delivering high-performance applications and engaging in solution consulting that aligns with enterprise software sales needs. Skilled in **Minitab Statistical Software** and **Minitab Connect**, facilitating insightful technical presentations and effective customer engagement processes.
In addition to sales acumen, I possess hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a strong focus on both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a solid background in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, supported by a robust understanding of compliance frameworks such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, I am adept at account planning and analyzing market trends to drive innovative technology solutions.
